name: mirthfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of laughter, humour, or happiness: He rubbed his hands together mirthfully when he heard the news. A group of children was playing mirthfully and dancing about.
More examplesFewer examplesHe laughed, but not entirely mirthfully.He mirthfully described his life as a touring musician.She mirthfully scanned the audience to make sure we'd all heard what she said.He winked at us mirthfully as he left the room.She replied merrily, her eyes gleaming mirthfully.
